title: Interdisciplinary collaborative education for sustainable green infrastructure development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental urban planning and environmental management concepts
context.additional_context: A collaborative educational program for current practitioners, focusing on strengthening green infrastructure project design capabilities through interdisciplinary expert collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can explain interdisciplinary collaborative communication strategies required for green infrastructure development projects
Learners can analyze the roles of diverse expert groups and propose collaboration methods when establishing sustainable plans
Learners can demonstrate practical skills in evaluating technical and social factors at each implementation stage of green infrastructure through case studies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
